name: Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah
description: Her heart unwavering, Xayah carries the fenghuang's blessing with her across the once peaceful lands. She makes quick work of those who would lay waste to the relics of the past, her magic mirroring their beauty in a harmonious dance. If they wield their power in order to honor their ancestors, Xayah is confident that the forces of good will prevail.
